name: PropellorPlunderers
description:
Propellor Plunderers is a top down vertical scroller with a twist, you can take over enemy planes and use their abilities for yourself.

PC Controls:
Movement - W A S D
Shoot - Space or Mouse1
Steal - Q

Controller Controls:
Movement - Right Stick
Shoot - 'x' or RT and LT
Steal - RB

Mobile Controls:
Movement - Device Tilt
Shoot - Right Button
Steal - Left Button
